job_location: Vancouver office and 6-10 weeks at Dokie Site in Chetwynd, BC (may not be continuous)
salary: $150/Day Vancouver, $200/Day Dokie, Overtime on site is $40/hour (MR)
job_description: o Assist site and office staff in maintaining a computer-based maintenance management system (Maximo) for an operational wind farm and develop or design reports that are required by operational staff.o Participate in annual substation maintenance outage inspection and testing at site, and take lead role in documenting this work in Maximo.o Complete backlog entry of all maintenance work into Maximo.o Coordinate and manage annual testing program for wind turbine tower anchor bolts, and rock anchor bolts, including contractor management, work inspection, reporting.o Assist with other tasks related to operations of the Dokie wind farm, as required.o There may be opportunities to gain exposure and work on the Toba Montrose hydro project, as time and schedule permits.
job_requirements: o Job requires a high degree of organization and attention to detailo Excellent attitude towards safetyo Willing to work in both an office and field settingo Ability to work with minimal supervision – self startero Flexibility to contribute wherever help is requiredo Good computer skills – exposure to database management would be an asseto An understanding of electrical power system equipment would be advantageous  but is not necessaryOpen To All Majors:No
